Package cz.zcu.kiv.crce.metadata.dao

Interface MetadataDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MetaDataDaoMongo
    @ParametersAreNonnullByDefault
public interface MetadataDao
    Plugin implementing this class manages retrieving and storing metadata of an artifact.

    Typical usage of MetadataDao plugin is in repository core to manipulate and manage metadata resource while uploading artifacts, retrieving them, copying etc.

    Version:
    3.0.0
    Author:
    Jiri Kucera (jiri.kucera@kalwi.eu)

      • loadRepository

        @CheckForNull
Repository loadRepository​(URI uri)
                   throws IOException
        Reads metadata of resources stored in repository on the given URI.
        Parameters:
        uri - Path to repository or a repository identificator.
        Returns:
        Loaded repository or null if such repository doesn't exist.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • saveRepository

        void saveRepository​(Repository repository)
             throws IOException
        Stores metadata of resources stored in the given repository. Typical target is a repository.xml in the root folder of the repository.
        Parameters:
        repository -
        Throws:
        IOException
